ActorTalk: Y'all be the judge! Look at that cup! That was cat hair inside, wasn't it?
Sir, is there something I can help you with?
If I'd swallowed that, I could've gotten some weird disease! Who's gonna take responsibility?
I-I'm very sorry... We'll remake your drink, and your whole order will be on the house...
A free drink won't help if someone gets sick! You're gonna pay for the hospital bills too?
Yeah! This is completely unacceptable!
This is a food safety issue. You'd better give me a proper explanation.
Exactly. The security footage can prove it.
(Tsk, guess I'll have to back off for now.)
S-should we show the footage to the customer...?
No, no, no! Just a misunderstanding! I've got things to do. Gotta go!
[PlayerName], I've already sent the last hour of security footage to your terminal.
S-stop teasing me! I really do have urgent business!
This must be some kind of misunderstanding. I'll be going now. Bye!
These types always act tough until they're exposed.
Oh right... Manager [PlayerName], Jason said he wants to talk to you.
Got it.
I'll take it from here.
If there's a problem, you can talk to me.
Our cafe follows strict hygiene protocols.
There are no cats allowed anywhere near the kitchen.
Want to see how great you look on camera?
Carrying cat hair into a cafeâ€”pretty suspicious.
I'll leave the cleanup to you, then.
Alright. Stay calm next time something like this happens.
